Former Attribution: Formerly attributed to Johann Matthias Kager (German, Munich 1575–1634 Augsburg)
Medium: Pen and black ink, gray wash, heightened with white (partially oxidized)
Provenance: Dr. Alfred Ritter von Wurzbach-Tannenberg (Lemberg 1845–1915 Vienna)
Donor: Gift of Katrin Bellinger Kunsthandel , Munich Vendor: Sale, Galerie Bassenge (Berlin)28 Nov., 1997, Auction no.70, lot no.5461
